original_text:
May God give you of the dew of heaven
    and of the fatness of the earth
    and plenty of grain and wine.
korean_text: 하나님은 하늘의 이슬과 땅의 기름짐이며 풍성한 곡식과 포도주를 네게 주시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: May God give you of the dew of heaven
and of the fatness of the earth
and plenty of grain and wine
